title: Weather Data
description: Version 0.1. The schema describes the weather data format for the IPM Decisions platform. See an example here: https://ipmdecisions.nibio.no/api/wx/rest/weatheradapter/yr/?longitude=14.3711&latitude=67.2828&altitude=70

timeStart.description: The timestamp of the first weather observation. Format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX", e.g. 2020-04-09T18:00:00+02:00
timeStart.title: Time start (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX)

timeEnd.description: The timestamp of the last weather observation. Format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX", e.g. 2020-04-09T18:00:00+02:00
timeEnd.title: Time end (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX)

interval.description: The sampling frequency in seconds. E.g. 3600 = hourly values
interval.title: Sampling frequency (seconds)

weatherParameters.description: The weather parameters. For reference, see https://ipmdecisions.nibio.no/api/wx/rest/parameter
weatherParameters.title: Weather parameters

longitude.description: The longitude of the location. Decimal degrees (WGS84)
longitude.title: Longitude (WGS84)

latitude.description: The latitude of the location. Decimal degrees (WGS84)
latitude.title: Latitude (WGS84)

altitude.description: The altitude of the location. Measured in meters
altitude.title: Altitude (Meters)

data.description: The data. In rows, ordered chronologically. Columns ordered as given in weatherParameters.
data.title: Weather data per location
